channel.title: CVE Feed for Advantech -- WebAccess/SCADA
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Advantech -- WebAccess/SCADA

item.title: CVE-2019-6550|2024-08-04T20:23:21.543Z -- advantech -- webaccess%2Fscada
item.description: Advantech WebAccess/SCADA, Versions 8.3.5 and prior. Multiple stack-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities, caused by a lack of proper validation of the length of user-supplied data, may allow remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2019-6554|2024-08-04T20:23:21.684Z -- advantech -- webaccess%2Fscada
item.description: Advantech WebAccess/SCADA, Versions 8.3.5 and prior. An improper access control vulnerability may allow an attacker to cause a denial-of-service condition.

item.title: CVE-2019-3975|2024-08-04T19:26:27.639Z -- advantech -- webaccess%2Fscada
item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow in Advantech WebAccess/SCADA 8.4.1 allows a remote, unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary code via a crafted IOCTL 70603 RPC message.

item.title: CVE-2019-6552|2024-08-04T20:23:22.066Z -- advantech -- webaccess%2Fscada
item.description: Advantech WebAccess/SCADA, Versions 8.3.5 and prior. Multiple command injection vulnerabilities, caused by a lack of proper validation of user-supplied data, may allow remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-2453|2024-08-01T19:11:53.526Z -- advantech -- webaccess%2Fscada
item.description: There is an SQL injection vulnerability in Advantech WebAccess/SCADA software that allows an authenticated attacker to remotely inject SQL code in the database. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could allow an attacker to read or modify data on the remote database.

item.title: CVE-2024-2453|2024-03-21T22:39:38.185Z -- advantech -- webaccess%2Fscada
item.description: There is an SQL injection vulnerability in Advantech WebAccess/SCADA software that allows an authenticated attacker to remotely inject SQL code in the database. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could allow an attacker to read or modify data on the remote database.

item.title: CVE-2024-2453|2024-07-08T19:52:58.826Z -- advantech -- webaccess%2Fscada
item.description: There is an SQL injection vulnerability in Advantech WebAccess/SCADA software that allows an authenticated attacker to remotely inject SQL code in the database. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could allow an attacker to read or modify data on the remote database.
